Any half decent American online apps stores would be able to refund if there is an installation or system matching issue especially when the license code has NOT been activated or used. I had to report them to my bank.  PCSalesOnline later refunded me after my bank began a fraud investigation.  The money $48 was not big amount, but the level of frustration they had put me through and many hours of time they had wasted me was overwhelming.  Do NOT buy Microsoft products from PCSalesonline to avoid frustration and many many hours wasted is my Recommendation.  If you have similar experience, be sure to contact your bank immediately !

Great price! But somehow I got a $1.00 extra charge and a $39.00 extra charge. My credit card company notified me if this. I haven’t used the Word program yet, assuming it will work fine

Issues with setup.The product keys that you sent with the original purchase did not work so I had to go online to your help team who eventually sent me new codes which worked.  The product is good and your team were very helpful but it was frustrating that I needed to utilise their expertise for something which should have been much easier.

Review.Titre: When I purchase a new Office license
Review.Contenu: When I purchase a new Office license, I expect the license to activate "online".  Getting the message that this license has already been activated, forcing me to use the "phone activation service" of Microsoft doesn't instill confidence.  The price is good, but are you really getting a legal license?  That remains a question I'm asking myself.

Review.Titre: Couldn't get the software to download…
Review.Contenu: Couldn't get the software to download after purchase. Wound up getting it downloaded with the website Chat feature. Then was successful with installing. Took a couple of days to do all this.

Review.Titre: Price is 5 star, Activation process a 1 star.
Review.Contenu: Price is 5 star.  The process to activate is confusing, at best a 1 star.  Thankfully I've used the phone update process in the past.  I was hoping that the activation code given to me at the time of the download would have instantly activated the product.  No such luck.  It always makes you feel uneasy, praying that you have a valid code to activate.  It worked and all is good now, but I could do without the hassle of activation by phone.

Review.Titre: Part of it was on me
Review.Contenu: Part of it was on me and my lack of reading, part of it was on them, I bought an online code thinking it was a disc and once I bought it I had a code I didn't write down or screen shot. So it was wasted. I thought I would've gotten a email at least saying hey here's what you bought here's and your code as a just in case but no.

Purchased Ms-Office and MS-Visio downloads (non-subscription). Download process was simple enough, but product keys provided cannot be authenticated online and must be done over the phone. Additionally, the phone authentication system has a step where you have to press a key on your phone to indicate that you are a real person. So far this step does not work for the Visio product so I am stuck with an unauthorized but yet completely paid for product.

Review.Titre: I actually got a great product at a…
Review.Contenu: I actually got a great product at a good price from the website. No issues with that. I do have issues with the activation process. When I typed in the license number into the software to activate it, I got an error message saying this license had already been used to activate the software. My only option was to use phone activation, which was a very tedious process that took ~20 minutes of typing/reading long sequences of numbers.

Had to contact chatThe license works great, but I had to contact tech support and get a code to activate, the code they provided didn't work at first.Half an hour after this review, they called me over and over again to try to get me to go to some random website in my browser.

PLEASE PLEASE make it clear that before downloading and installing Microsoft Office products you MUST UNINSTALL any versions already on your PC. Perhaps include in the Order confirmation and again on the page where the product is downloaded.I spent way too much time on the installation with 2 very nice techs but this could have been easily avoided.

The site worked well and I received my key quickly, but the credit card I used was compromised within 48 hours of my transaction. I can not state for certain that it was compromised through PC Sales Online, but it was the only non-standard vendor I'd done business with lately.

Review.Titre: As advertised : I got what I asked for.
Review.Contenu: As advertised, items came in undamaged and working right out the box. This system will serve the purpose of just doing simulator type games. I will also in the near future purchase an additional system to rum Windows 11.

Review.Titre: I would rate this lower but the…
Review.Contenu: I would rate this lower but the customer rep finally got the program going. I had a huge amount of difficulty getting my download of Office to work. Joseph did a fabulous job in helping me. It took many failed tries but he was finally able to help me get it right. I thank him for his help and patience.UPDATE: I had to get with customer rep again because the "fix" that was done actually didn't work.  It makes me wonder if this week or next the program won't be working

Ordered Office 2013. Ran into issues downloading. Key Code previously used. had to contact via chat.  Finally resolved issue.  I would probably use another service/retailer in  the future.  I would bet that since I gave it 3 stars this review will not be posted publicly.  Therefore, I took a screen shot of this for posting elsewhere.  Yeah....I'm an ecommerce guru.

Very good price. Otherwise I would have given 0 stars. Had lots of problems with download. Had to load a Microsoft product to clear up residual MS products before it would load. Now it won't register with MS (online or by telephone) and I've got 29 days to use the product and try to figure out the problem or I won't be able to use. So basically it's been problematic from the beginning. I don't even know whether I'll be able to keep using it after a month unless I can register.

The product code I was given for my Microsoft Office was invalid.  It was wasted a lot of my time because I couldn't complete the download.  Then I had to call Microsoft.  More frustration and a waste of my time.  I was thankful PCSales Online did take my phone call.  The tech said the fix was too complicated for me and I had to give him control of my computer.  I REALLY did NOT want to do that but felt I had no choice.  The tech tried to install another product code that was invalid.  Finally a valid product code was used and I am relived many hours of frustration are over and I have a working Microsoft Office.

Throughout the process, I felt I was being manipulated & herded into actions & responses that Microsoft wanted me to take.  I did want the product (Windows 10) so I went along, but I did not want to join anything, sign up for this service or that option - just the product please.

Review.Titre: Buying from PCSales Online Could have been better had they been upfront about uninstalling Microsoft 365 in the beginning.
Review.Contenu: Your Agents Alexander, Vicky and Angel did all they could to help and I thank them however George referred me to Tom when I wanted a partial refund for a Microsoft product to replace Microsoft 365. Tom danced around trying to smooth things over but after 2 weeks I'd had enough & penned a letter to Microsoft Head Office and received an Immediate refund- no questions.I was not told until after my purchase that I would have to uninstall Microsoft 365. If I had known, I never would have even tried to purchase a replacement that was compatible with my old files.Lesson Learned Rose

Review.Pseudo: Do not want my name published
Review.Contenu: I’m happy that you independently noticed the problem and took corrective action. I had given up, and more importantly was unable to communicate by phone (the line consistently hung up on me). Frankly speaking, I was pissed. I ended up buying another license elsewhere because I thought I had been taken for a fool. I spent the money twice. Based on my experience, I would not be a repeat buyer.

Upgraded from office 2011 to 2019. Can’t save files to my previous documents folders. It wants to put them in the One Drive. Support person was very helpful in getting rid of the error message and getting it working. However, after I deleted One Drive, I can’t save my files in the previous document folder. Will have to contact support again for assistance, since I am not savvy enough to figure it out on my own.

Review.Titre: Still have issues with outlook setting…
Review.Contenu: Still have issues with outlook setting up emails. Takes a while to work around registration key as it says it is oversold.

Only gave it a 3 because I never received a reply to my messages.  The software installed OK, no problems. But, the license key would not allow the App to be registered. All available installs had been used.I sent a message from my chuckc@9plus net:[S]	Normal	[ ]		support at pcsalesonline.com	04:02 AM 4/23/2021	 2	Order # NUCYRBHCII also sent one via the on-line contact form.  I'll call the contact number.  Thanks.

Review.Titre: The purchase of the MicroSoft Office…
Review.Contenu: The purchase of the MicroSoft Office license and download was easy enough. However when I tried to activate it online I got a message saying the license was already installed on the max number of machines. I had to call MicroSoft and activate. We all know how painful that is

While the product downloaded and installed correctly, I think, any time I try to use it I am asked to log in and re-provide a product key and then tells me the key I was provided had already been used. I'm unsure if this is the product, or Microsoft in general,  or me, but I did follow all directions precisely.

Review.Titre: while my sever was polite and friendly…
Review.Contenu: while my sever was polite and friendly her service was slow normally i leave red robin with an order of fries but due to her slow service to bring my take home box i sat there eating a full order and was never asked ifvinwould like a second plate of fries to go

Review.Titre: Should not have been that difficult
Review.Contenu: After talking to 2 reps and going thru a lot of back and forth I got what I wanted eventually.  Then when I finally had my son to help with the download it said the key did not work.  My son called and talked to a rep (he had to give him the number he wanted and it was finally downloaded).  I don't think it should have been that difficult.  I am 83 years old and do not have a lot of computer knowledge but without my son  what would I have done?

Review.Titre: I bought a copy of Windows 10 pro and…
Review.Contenu: I bought a copy of Windows 10 pro and office 2016 and both activation codes did not work. Tried to call there  1888 number and it didn't work (I am in Canada, so it might be a US only line), on there web site I was able to use the chat function and they gave me new codes to use. End of the day I have activated version of both now for a great price so I guess that is all that matters.

Review.Titre: Delivery and service were prompt and…
Review.Contenu: Delivery and service were prompt and professional.Listing was however misleading in that the PC I thought I was bought was an older model than currently described.   thus ports that I expected were not actually present which was disappointing.Care must be taken in ensuring what model you are actually purchasing as pictures may actually be depicting earlier models

Review.Titre: The good and not so good
Review.Contenu: 1) Product price and delivery was great. 5 stars2) When I registered the product, I was told by the automated registration software the number was a "used" number and I had to call Microsoft to register. In the end, Microsoft did register it on the phone and so PC Sales Online did "deliver". 1 starAverage = 3 starsResult: I would be hesitant to buy again, in spite of the fact in part 1 above.

Review.Titre: It took a lot of extra work to retrieve…
Review.Contenu: It took a lot of extra work to retrieve the license and install it.  I was forced to do the telephone license retrieval method (twice) before it was accepted.  I made numerous attempts to contact the company for help.  No one would reply, nor was I able to contact anyone.  I also tried the online chat - with no success.  Thanks for having an answer to every comment that I made.  Please don't send any more responses.

Review.Titre: We were not told to uninstall program…
Review.Contenu: We were not told to uninstall program on the computer, this caused difficulty and was time consuming in trying to download your program.  We were chatting with your representative, and he did not mention uninstalling the program.After taking a long time, we chatted again and he did it another way.  It got done, just took more time.

The license originally didn't activate.The support person was very helpful and sent detailed instructions on how to fix the issue and I successfully completed activation.This still was not an easy purchase.

Review.Titre: Totally my fault for not thoroughly…
Review.Contenu: Totally my fault for not thoroughly vetting what I was getting, but you are NOT getting a download of MS Office, you are only getting a downloaded link to the software. Meaning, you cannot make a back up copy on a flash drive!!!  I am very unhappy about it and won't purchase online anymore without verifying what is being sold.

the last two orders.  I have had to contact you for a direct download.  I always get a error where they key is already used.  You forced me to active the key by calling in and putting in the 20+ code to get a 2+ activation code.

Review.Titre: New program installed on non-existent drive.
Review.Contenu: After being on the phone over an hour, the problem was not resolved.  I finally repeated to the tech who was "helping" me what the original problem was.  he then fixed the problem in about three minutes.  He was the third person I spoke with with a problem that should have been fixed in less than 5 minutes

Review.Titre: The program downloaded with no problem…
Review.Contenu: The program downloaded with no problem but would initially not activate.  A message from Microsoft said that the keycode was invalid.  After a number of failed attempts a call to PC Sales customer service resulted in a new keycode being sent and successful activation.

It was very disconcerting initially to find out that the software I downloaded could not be registered with Microsoft. Come to find out the software was scavenged from a deactivated PC. In the end, the person on the service line was able to take care of it, but the experience just wasn’t what I expected.

It was difficult to install. The company contact phone number does not work in Canada. I had to contact the company through chat and have them call me. It took over an hour to install but now it works fine.

Review.Titre: Support link to sales pitch for another product
Review.Contenu: I did have an issue with the installation. The support link in the purchase email was to a sales location for a product that I couldn't get past. Fortunately, I figured out the problem on my own. The product is what I ordered. Download worked as expected.

For Windows 10 Pro, I had trouble installing, contacted customer service which was friendly enough, but took a long time to work through.  After working through my issue with installation and keys, I rebooted and computer had a boot error.  I couldn't get into Windows at all.  Had to take it to a computer repair center to get a new Windows copy installed.  Would like a refund for Windows, as it never did work properly.For Office, it worked really well with no issues and installed easily.So overall - 3 stars.  One star for Windows, five stars for Office.

Review.Titre: What will help for customers: Provide applications included with product
Review.Contenu: What will help for customers: Provide detail specs on the product like you should. When a customer is making a decision on a product, we don't have time to ask a question to get the specs (what applications are included) on the product. That's crazy!

Review.Titre: Initial on line live help was NOT…
Review.Contenu: Initial on line live help was NOT helpful. Sent me to a YouTube video with barely understandable actor. When I pointed this out I was told to turn on sub titles!!Third person helped solve my installation problem.

I bought Win 10 and downloaded it as told. I could not get my PC to boot with it and the support team was of no help. In essence, I wasted time and money and have no way to use the product. Not a happy experience.

I haven't downloaded it yet; I'm working on getting a windows machine to create the bloody install on the USB.  Sure would be nice if your system did the image on your side then download it to USB via any route, like a tablet or smartphone.

Great prices and product key arrives in minutes.  Unfortunately, I purchased Windows 10 Professional but once loaded onto my computer, turns out I got Windows 10 Home. The home version works fine and it's too much work to go back so I'll live with it.

Review.Titre: Ok now but had installation issues
Review.Contenu: I purchased a refurbished Windows 10 PC from Amazon.  It has been running flawlessly now for about two months.  All is good now, but the setup was not easy.  Their hard drive image did not have the right hardware drivers for the built in Network interface/card.  I tried without success to contact their customer service via phone and email.  No response on either.  I finally got past the setup issue by installing Windows 10 without a Network connection.  Once installed, I downloaded the correct network hardware drivers and continued with updating the OS.  Again, their customer support was nowhere to be found.

Review.Titre: Not truthful upfront but made it right, mostly
Review.Contenu: On the one hand I was disappointed when I learned I would have to uninstall Office if I wanted Visio.  Feels like the tail wagging the dog. Didn’t want to do all that. On the other hand I got very little pushback when I requested a refund...albeit 80%.

Review.Titre: the product appears to be a good one
Review.Contenu: the product appears to be a good one, but it took way longer than I was used to to download and put the entire package into affect.  Could be "operator error" on my part, however.

Review.Titre: Received a key that would not register.
Review.Contenu: Received a key that would not register.Edit: After contacting support, everything is working fine. I shouldn't have had to do it to begin with, but I'll change the 1 star to 3 due to resolution.

Review.Titre: The software was activated but I had to…
Review.Contenu: The software was activated but I had to use a phone to do it. My initial attempt to register online generated s message that the activation key had been used too many times already. I suspect this office key is being sold illegally.

Review.Titre: You sold me a previously used license…
Review.Contenu: You sold me a previously used license that failed to activate online.  I was forced to take the client through the tedious telephone activation, then explain to them why their "legit" license failed to activate.

Review.Titre: Product is good and has a good price…
Review.Contenu: Product is good and has a good price however the installation instructions were terrible. The download I received was Windows 10 home version .  I had paid for Windows 10 pro version . I had to get chat help to help me install Windows 10 Pro. The product key code for Windows 10 Pro didn't work after installation download. Chat support had give me a new product key code that worked but it installed Windows 10 Enterprise but was not activated. I had to reboot my computer and update Windows before it we back to Windows 10 Pro. After all this I was able to activate Windows 10 Pro with the key code I received in my email.

Review.Titre: the product was exactly what i needed…
Review.Contenu: the product was exactly what i needed and paid for .. on line ordering was excellent, simple and fast, unfortunately the key wouldnt work and so I had to go back and forwards with the on line help the next day which was frustrating.

Review.Titre: Could not activate over the internet…
Review.Contenu: Could not activate over the internet had to call on all three purchases. Took a lot of time I didn't have. Really frustrating.

Review.Titre: Price was great but when I used the…
Review.Contenu: Price was great but when I used the validation key, I was told I had already used the max number of subscriptions allowed (1!).  Spent over 1/2 an hour inputting a ridiculous number of codes before I was activated.

Bought two products.  I had to do a telephone activation with both.  One agent explained that this was because the license was "used."  I am not sure what that means but the "Is it legal" rears it's head.

I ordered and payed for office2018 on July 2nd ,   but only received the license   key an download instructions on July  24th after request by telephone and later by email to PCS.Agent George was most helpful
Finally got the software installed but it took several hours and a new product validation key. A tough way to buy MS Office but the tech stuck with me

Review.Titre: The price was right and the software…
Review.Contenu: The price was right and the software works. The only challenge was with getting the key to activate the software, - after a lot of wasted time fooling around with the instructions, it took a phone call to manually activate. I'm not going to complain as my goal was to have a recent program without having to buy a subscription or use software that's in the cloud. PC Sales Online delivered exactly what I thought I was buying and it works. Can't ask for much more! I shaved two stars because posting this review results in me being forced to have a "Trustpilot" account. The last thing I need is more accounts, more emails, more surveys. The experience had been a good one until this came up. A huge negative - just let customers post the review, but don't force additional accounts on them.
I Bought Microsoft Office 2019. Wouldn't activate automatically. I had to call the number and manually input numbers to activate it. Other than that, works fine.

Review.Titre: I was very impressed with the quick…

Review.Titre: Quick service with great prices- the…
Review.Contenu: Quick service with great prices- the only issue is the MS Office software license is not properly registered with MS and always needs to create a new key which takes about 20 minutes….a real pain!

Dear Customer Service,I could never use the product to unlock  Windows 10 Pro, despite repeated attempts and calls to customer service. Eventually the machine locked up and I spent hours with Microsoft trying to get the machine up and get access to my data. At that point I abandoned attempting the upgrade and am respectfully requesting that PC Sales Online refund my account. I am not pointing any fingers here as I believe that this is somehow a function of MS subscription services that may be running in the background. However, this is not my area of expertise and its far too technical for me to pursue when it negatively impacts my productivity.Thank you for your attempts to redress this and your patience.Best Regards,Raymond N. Ervin

While I had some issues activating my MS Office license, PC Sales Online was responsive and saw me through a successful product activation.  Given the extended price, it was still well worth the experience. Would use again.

Review.Titre: I needed help from CS to get the…

The activation procedure was ambiguous and I had some difficulty to accomplish. The download also didn't go to the flash drive as advertised and I had to download directly to the computer. The process was not smooth.
They resolved my problemYou need to put more of the doc that tells how to install the program. such as disable 365, and Window-S. Highlight them so people do that first.

Review.Titre: Nice product and great customer service.

When I tried to activate I received a message that my key had already been used.  I hopped on to the PC Sales chat and was explained how I could activate by phone directly with Microsoft.  While the process was involved it was easy and my program activated flawlessly.  There was no wait time reaching Microsoft. I am very pleased.  Great customer service.

Review.Titre: Customer service was very helpful and…
Review.Contenu: Customer service was very helpful and helped me through everything I needed .. quick and easy . Thanks

The price was right, the activation was unsettling.  When I attempted to activate the product key, I was informed that it was already in used.  I called PC Sales Online and they instructed me to use the "Call Microsoft" option to activate the product.  It took a few minutes but fortunately it worked.

Review.Pseudo: Do not want my name used

It kept saying it was installed, showed up in the list of installed applications. In spite of that I could not find the installed software. Finally technician had to install the software.There is risk when somebody takes over your computer. I am assuming the installtion did not insert any tracking software.

Your prices are excellent.  We are still using stand alone MS software such as MS Office Professional Plus 2019 and have not moved to MS 365 (yet).Your over-the-phone tech support is awesome.  I always get the error message that the product code has already been used which requires assistance from your group.  I found that the he online chat is a little awkward for this type of support.

Customer service was great. They helped complete the installation for me remote. However I don't think it should have been so complicated so I question why I needed their help in the first place (I received an error message with the license key I was provided, yet customer service was able to make it work).

I wasn't sure whether this was a legit deal. So after checking out other  positive reviews bought a software for v.good price. It was tricky to install but the customer service was very good and assisted me to successfully install the software. All is good. Thank you kindly!

Review.Titre: PC online sales software worked as advertised
Review.Contenu: The link for me to download the software I purchased did not work. However, their customer service provided the link I needed via a chat session. Also, their activation instructions were very accurate. Overall, I was thrilled to get the software I needed at a deeply discounted price.

As others have reported, the registration and activation of the software can get complicated. At first Microsoft gave the message that the license was oversubscribed, which does happen with these group licenses.  But the PC Sales support was quick to respond.  Then, when Microsoft gave me the same "activation" request you get with unauthorized software, PC Sales explained the work-around. It didn't seem to matter that it was on the weekend or after hours, support was prompt and effective.

I had two live chat sessions for technical advice, and both technicians were very knowledgeable and helpful. My questions were answered, and the end result was a successful download and installation. I was also very satisfied with your online price for Office 2019.

I just purchased a Windows 10 Pro key and received it immediately however it didn't work right away. I chatted with a representative and he had me activate it by phone with Microsoft. I was nervous about doing it but it was easy to do and worked just fine. Microsoft texted me a link to the phone number I called them from and I followed along and BOOM windows is now activated.

Review.Titre: Easy to order, and download, but HARD TO ACTIVATE

I do not understand why the activations say the product has already been activated before and then I have to work with support to get it activated through Microsoft.  The long list of numbers to activated it is strange.  I just hope Microsoft honors my software as valid and will allow me to uninstall it when this PC dies and lets me mover it to my new PC.

They have a system to help you install the product code key. And the automated, or sometimes human, system works okay, if you do it over the phone. So, it wasn't perfect, but we got our 2 office programs installed easily enough. Would recommend.

Upgrading (in this case to Windows 10) is not a trivial exercise, but there was adequate instruction in the process.  Since my computer did not want to install over the existing system, WIN 7, and my files, did a clean install. Spent a little time at the end finding correct driver for video.

Download was easy. During installation there was an error when it came time to put in the activation key. It said the key would not be accepted because there were too many installations already completed with it. I had to go through a lengthy and somewhat frustrating process on the phone to get a legitimate key.
Had a problem activating the Home & Student 2021 but the customer service was superb. Was patient with me all the time. And knowledgeable with the product.

The tech support guy got on the line very quickly and had it going in a few minutes.

Review.Titre: I would have given it 4.5 stars if I…

fast responses to all questions, the only issue is that you have to use telephone activation of the windows product
Excellent price for Microsoft Office 2019 although different under Win11 than Win10. Prompt delivery after payment. Took quite a long time to activate. Going well now

Great price and easy purchase. The reason for 4 stars is they make the installation process difficult. This was my 4th purchase of the same software and had go thru the same difficult and time consuming process to input the Product key

Competitive prices. The license I got did not the first time, but customer service fix this after 10 minutes aprox.
Received product as described.   I did have to activate by phone but it went as expected.  No further problems.
The price was good, but the process to download my software took well over an hour. I had to call the manufacturer for assistance.

Got what we were looking for quickly and was able to order easily.

Review.Titre: If you're looking for a legit MS…
